name: Galaxy Kingdoms
description:
Galaxy Kingdoms is an action/adventure shooter. Feel the journey of a bounty hunter as he explores the galaxy in search of quests and treasure. Strengthen yourself by buying new weapons and armor and then take on more powerful enemies.

Battle For Rewards

You are free to choose how you will face your enemies!
Enemies are intelligent, so the louder the noise, the more unwanted attention you will attract!Choose the best combat mode to complete the mission.

  • If you are not afraid to die, fight with everything!



  • Or be cautious and fight in the shadows.

Buy New Weapons

Weapons will not be lacking! You will find a huge variety of weapons.


For each mission there is an ideal weapon, so choose your weapon wisely.

Melhore Suas Armas!

If you want to be a famous and feared bounty hunter, you will need very strong weapons, so you need to upgrade your weapons.


  • Accept missions to get rewards.
  • Explore different planets in search of treasure.
  • Buy various weapons and upgrade them
  • Buy various armors
